name: ORDINARY PONG with a chance of mixing genres
name_original: ORDINARY PONG with a chance of mixing genres
description:
For the best quality experience, please download the game. Made for Mix & Jam in 48 hours. Controls                               Key-bindings                                                                                Paddle MovementUp Arrow & Down Arrow (or W & S)ShootSpace keyExit To Main MenuEscape key Note: The leaderboard may not load in WebGL. Brief explanation of each mode:
  • Easy mode - infinite play; you have 5 health points.
  • Hard mode - infinite play; you have 1 health point.
  • Tutorial - a tutorial level, with explanations at each appearance of a genre.
Credits:
  • Programming - Danial Jumagaliyev, Cactus, Zhubanysh Burlibaev
  • Pixel Art - Zhubanysh Burlibaev
  • Visual Effects - Danial Jumagaliyev
  • Sound Effects - kingscrown
  • Music - TeknoAxe
